associateaccounts.name: AssociateAccounts
associateaccounts.description: Grants permission to associate member accounts with the management account

createautomationrule.name: CreateAutomationRule
createautomationrule.description: Grants permission to create automation rule

deleteautomationrule.name: DeleteAutomationRule
deleteautomationrule.description: Grants permission to delete automation rule

disassociateaccounts.name: DisassociateAccounts
disassociateaccounts.description: Grants permission to disassociate member accounts from the management account

getautomationevent.name: GetAutomationEvent
getautomationevent.description: Grants permission to get automation event details

getautomationrule.name: GetAutomationRule
getautomationrule.description: Grants permission to get automation rule

getenrollmentconfiguration.name: GetEnrollmentConfiguration
getenrollmentconfiguration.description: Grants permission to get enrollment configuration

listaccounts.name: ListAccounts
listaccounts.description: Grants permission to list the accounts in your organization that are enrolled in Compute Optimizer and whether they have enabled the Automation feature

listautomationeventsteps.name: ListAutomationEventSteps
listautomationeventsteps.description: Grants permission to list automation event steps

listautomationeventsummaries.name: ListAutomationEventSummaries
listautomationeventsummaries.description: Grants permission to list automation event summaries

listautomationevents.name: ListAutomationEvents
listautomationevents.description: Grants permission to list automation events

listautomationrulepreview.name: ListAutomationRulePreview
listautomationrulepreview.description: Grants permission to list automation rule preview results

listautomationrulepreviewsummaries.name: ListAutomationRulePreviewSummaries
listautomationrulepreviewsummaries.description: Grants permission to list automation rule preview summaries

listautomationrules.name: ListAutomationRules
listautomationrules.description: Grants permission to list automation rules

listrecommendedactionsummaries.name: ListRecommendedActionSummaries
listrecommendedactionsummaries.description: Grants permission to list recommended action summaries

listrecommendedactions.name: ListRecommendedActions
listrecommendedactions.description: Grants permission to list recommended actions

listtagsforresource.name: ListTagsForResource
listtagsforresource.description: Grants permission to list tags for automation rule

rollbackautomationevent.name: RollbackAutomationEvent
rollbackautomationevent.description: Grants permission to initiate a rollback for an automation event

startautomationevent.name: StartAutomationEvent
startautomationevent.description: Grants permission to initiate an on-demand automation for a recommended action

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to add tags to automation rule

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to remove tags from automation rule

updateautomationrule.name: UpdateAutomationRule
updateautomationrule.description: Grants permission to update automation rule

updateenrollmentconfiguration.name: UpdateEnrollmentConfiguration
updateenrollmentconfiguration.description: Grants permission to update enrollment configuration for the Compute Optimizer automation feature
